an8.8:4.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ āyasmā uttaro mahisavatthusmiṃ viharati saṅkheyyake pabbate vaṭajālikāyaṃ.
an8.8:4.2: Tatra kho āyasmā uttaro bhikkhū āmantesi:
an8.8:4.3: “sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ attavipattiṃ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:4.4: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ paravipattiṃ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:4.5: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ attasampattiṃ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:4.6: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ parasampattiṃ paccavekkhitā hotī”ti.
an8.8:5.1: Tena kho pana samayena vessavaṇo mahārājā uttarāya disāya dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ gacchati kenacideva karaṇīyena.
an8.8:5.2: Assosi kho vessavaṇo mahārājā āyasmato uttarassa mahisavatthusmiṃ saṅkheyyake pabbate vaṭajālikāyaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ dhammaṃ desentassa:
an8.8:5.3: “sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ attavipattiṃ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:5.4: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ paravipattiṃ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:5.5: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ attasampattiṃ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:5.6: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ parasampattiṃ paccavekkhitā hotī”ti.
an8.8:6.2: seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
an8.8:6.3: evamevaṃ mahisavatthusmiṃ saṅkheyyake pabbate vaṭajālikāyaṃ antarahito devesu tāvatiṃsesu pāturahosi.
an8.8:6.4: Atha kho vessavaṇo mahārājā yena sakko devānamindo tenupasaṅkami;
an8.8:6.7: Eso āyasmā uttaro mahisavatthusmiṃ saṅkheyyake pabbate vaṭajālikāyaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ dhammaṃ deseti:
an8.8:6.8: ‘sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ attavipattiṃ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:6.9: Sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ paravipattiṃ … pe …
an8.8:7.1: Atha kho sakko devānamindo seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṃ vā bāhaṃ pasāreyya, pasāritaṃ vā bāhaṃ samiñjeyya;
an8.8:7.2: evamevaṃ devesu tāvatiṃsesu antarahito mahisavatthusmiṃ saṅkheyyake pabbate vaṭajālikāyaṃ āyasmato uttarassa sammukhe pāturahosi.
an8.8:7.3: Atha kho sakko devānamindo yenāyasmā uttaro tenupasaṅkami;
an8.8:7.4: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṃ uttaraṃ abhivādetvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi.
an8.8:7.5: Ekamantaṃ ṭhito kho sakko devānamindo āyasmantaṃ uttaraṃ etadavoca:
an8.8:8.1: “Saccaṃ kira, bhante, āyasmā uttaro bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ dhammaṃ desesi:
an8.8:8.2: ‘sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ attavipattiṃ paccavekkhitā hoti, sādhāvuso, bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ paravipattiṃ … pe …
an8.8:8.6: “Kiṃ panidaṃ, bhante, āyasmato uttarassa sakaṃ paṭibhānaṃ, udāhu tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassā”ti?
an8.8:8.8: Upamāya midhekacce viññū purisā bhāsitassa atthaṃ ājānanti.
an8.8:9.1: Seyyathāpi, devānaminda, gāmassa vā nigamassa vā avidūre mahādhaññarāsi.
an8.8:9.4: Yo nu kho, devānaminda, taṃ mahājanakāyaṃ upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ puccheyya:
an8.8:9.5: ‘kuto imaṃ dhaññaṃ āharathā’ti, kathaṃ byākaramāno nu kho, devānaminda, so mahājanakāyo sammā byākaramāno byākareyyā”ti?
an8.8:9.6: “‘Amumhā mahādhaññarāsimhā āharāmā’ti kho, bhante, so mahājanakāyo sammā byākaramāno byākareyyā”ti.
an8.8:9.7: “Evamevaṃ kho, devānaminda, yaṃ kiñci subhāsitaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
an8.8:9.8: Tato upādāyupādāya mayaṃ caññe ca bhaṇāmā”ti.
an8.8:10.3: ‘yaṃ kiñci subhāsitaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ tassa bhagavato vacanaṃ arahato sammāsambuddhassa.
an8.8:10.5: Ekamidaṃ, bhante uttara, samayaṃ bhagavā rājagahe viharati gijjhakūṭe pabbate acirapakkante devadatte.
an8.8:10.6: Tatra kho bhagavā devadattaṃ ārabbha bhikkhū āmantesi:
an8.8:11.1: ‘Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ attavipattiṃ paccavekkhitā hoti.
an8.8:11.2: Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kālena kālaṃ paravipattiṃ … pe …
an8.8:11.5: Aṭṭhahi, bhikkhave, asaddhammehi abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho.
an8.8:11.7: Lābhena hi, bhikkhave, abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho;
an8.8:11.14: pāpamittatāya, bhikkhave, abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho.
an8.8:11.15: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭhahi asaddhammehi abhibhūto pariyādinnacitto devadatto āpāyiko nerayiko kappaṭṭho atekiccho.
an8.8:12.1: Sādhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannaṃ lābhaṃ abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya;
an8.8:13.1: Kiñca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ lābhaṃ abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya;
an8.8:14.1: Yaṃ hissa, bhikkhave, uppannaṃ lābhaṃ anabhibhuyya viharato uppajjeyyuṃ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, uppannaṃ lābhaṃ abhibhuyya viharato evaṃsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
an8.8:14.2: Yaṃ hissa, bhikkhave, uppannaṃ alābhaṃ … pe …
an8.8:14.8: uppannaṃ pāpamittataṃ anabhibhuyya viharato uppajjeyyuṃ āsavā vighātapariḷāhā, uppannaṃ pāpamittataṃ abhibhuyya viharato evaṃsa te āsavā vighātapariḷāhā na honti.
an8.8:14.9: Idaṃ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasaṃ paṭicca uppannaṃ lābhaṃ abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya;
an8.8:15.2: “uppannaṃ lābhaṃ abhibhuyya abhibhuyya viharissāma, uppannaṃ alābhaṃ … pe …
an8.8:16.1: Ettāvatā, bhante uttara, manussesu catasso parisā—
an8.8:16.3: Nāyaṃ dhammapariyāyo kismiñci upaṭṭhito.
an8.8:16.4: Uggaṇhatu, bhante, āyasmā uttaro imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ.
an8.8:16.5: Pariyāpuṇātu, bhante, āyasmā uttaro imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ.
an8.8:16.6: Dhāretu, bhante, āyasmā uttaro imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ.
an8.8:16.7: Atthasaṃhito ayaṃ, bhante, dhammapariyāyo ādibrahmacariyako”ti.
